eu.stratosphere.nephele.rpc

Class RPCMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.rpc.RPCMessage

  • public abstract class RPCMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for all types of communication messages used by this RPC service.

    This class is thread-safe.

    Author:
    warneke

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAXIMUM_MSG_SIZE
      The largest amount of data to be put in a single DatagramPacket.
      static int METADATA_SIZE
      The amount of data reserved for meta data in each DatagramPacket.
